edu.thu.keg.mdap.datamodel

Interface DataContent

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Query
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SimpleQuery

    public interface DataContent
    Data Object, who gives access to actual data from data providers. It is used for fetching and writing data to data providers. It gives access to data in a streaming style.
    Author:
    Yuanchao Ma

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Close the stream, release any resources.
      DataField[] getFields() 
      java.lang.Object getValue(DataField field)
      Get value of the field of the current record
      boolean next()
      Advance to next record
      void open()
      Open the stream for reading data.

    • Method Detail

      • getFields

        DataField[] getFields()
        Returns:
        A array of contained fields in this DataContent

      • open

        void open()
          throws DataProviderException
        Open the stream for reading data.
        Throws:
        DataProviderException - When data provider gives a error.

      • close

        void close()
           throws DataProviderException
        Close the stream, release any resources.
        Throws:
        DataProviderException - When data provider gives a error.

      • next

        boolean next()
             throws DataProviderException
        Advance to next record
        Returns:
        True if it is not the end of the stream
        Throws:
        DataProviderException - When data provider gives a error.

      • getValue

        java.lang.Object getValue(DataField field)
                          throws DataProviderException
        Get value of the field of the current record
        Parameters:
        field - The DataField whose value is expected
        Returns:
        The value
        Throws:
        DataProviderException - When data provider gives a error, or the field does not exist in this DataContent.
